text:
="preserve">Rosaly Davidman Papadopol (23 February 1956 – 16 December 2020) was a Brazilian actress. She was born in São Paulo, São Paulo. Her career began in 1975. Papadopol was known for her roles as Florinda in the 1987 drama "Night Angels" and as Sofia in the 2001 crime "Bellini and the Sphinx".
Papadopol died of lymphoma on 16 December 2020 in São Paulo at the age of 64.
